name: Polter-Guest
description:
Escape from a lab, steal the bodies of your enemies and find your ghost girlfriend ! In Polter-Guest, you play as Paul, the poltergeist, late for his date with a ghost girl after he was captured by scientists. Escape the laboratory and make your way through the forest by possessing your foes ! Your date is waiting for you at the cemetery.

                            

Controls :

-WASD\Arrow keys : Move Paul

-Left click : Steal the body of an enemy from behind

-R : Respawn at the begining of the level

Once you possess the body of an enemy, their life adds up to your and you unlock new abilities :

-Left click : Cast a dark fireball to kill enemies, but drains 1 heart from your host's life

-Right Click : Instantly kills your host to get a bonus to your movment speed for a short duration
